main.name: Zunayed Mahfuz
main.description: Dynamic, forward-thinking individual with an organized and energetic nature focused on growing my professional skills through an internship or staff position with a technology company and using those skills to produce outstanding results for the company.
main.bio: I have demonstrated success in leadership and communications, with a proven ability to engage teammates and bring them together to creatively solve problems. A “go-to-guy,” I bring attention to detail, a solid work ethic, and the will to succeed to any project in which I am involved. Technical expertise includes Selenium WebDriver, TestNG, Cucumber, Postman, Jenkins, Javascript, React, Ruby on rails, SQL, Junit, TestNG..
main.contactmessage: Feel free to visit my GitHub at https://github.com/zmahfuz0613.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Quality Automation Engineer
work.description: Ensure tasks performed are consistent with established company priorities. Report accurate and timelyproject/task status to management. Develops and executes moderate to highly complex scripted automated tests under management supervision

work.title: Senior QA Analyst
work.description: Participated in release planning, sprint planning, daily scrum and retrospective in agile scrum environment. Identified and developed test scenarios, Test Cases, Test Scripts and performed Manual testing on the entire Application. Wrote test cases in Gherkin and automated them using CucumberLogged and tracked defects using Atlassian’s JIRA. Developing automated scripts using Java in Selenium Web Driver with Maven, Cucumber, TestNG,Page Object Model (POM)

projects.title: Trinity place shelter
projects.category: I have been given a design by the General Assembly UX to develop and deploy for a non-profit organization

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
